parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets right picture on the tree view item defined by path </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvSetPictureRight]] [idc, path, name] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> p3</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - picture texture </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvSetPictureRight]] [path, name] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetPictureRight]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], "picture"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
